Canadian Ml and UK M4 are drawn from IFS. The US Ml is drawn from the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louiss FRED II system. The euro area Ml is drawn from the ECBs Area Wide Macroeconomic Model (AWIVI) described in Fagan et al. (2001), located on the Euro Area Business Cycle Network website (http://www.eabcn.org/data/awrniindex.htrn).
